Key phrase: 'Ela fode, fode, transa muito, mete o louco e vai embora' → 'She fucks, fucks, has a lot of sex, goes crazy and then leaves.'. Mention tense/person endings and any idiomatic chunk the learner should memorize.

lines.text: Vou, pela madruga eu vou, encontrar um novo amor
